body:
I rebased this on master to fix the merge conflicts, and incorporated the feedback from @georgf and @gijsk. Apologies that I wasn't able to make it a second commit for a good interdiff, the rebase was not kind to workflow.

@gijsk Can you give this another pass and, if it is ready, tell bors r+?

I don't know if this is needed, or if you already have access, but it can't hurt:

bors delegate= @gijsk

body_html:
I rebased this on master to fix the merge conflicts, and incorporated the feedback from @georgf and @gijsk. Apologies that I wasn't able to make it a second commit for a good interdiff, the rebase was not kind to workflow.

@gijsk Can you give this another pass and, if it is ready, tell bors r+?

I don't know if this is needed, or if you already have access, but it can't hurt:

bors delegate= @gijsk
